query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ab_variants (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  experimentId INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  interventionType VARCHAR(255),
  interventionContent TEXT,
  weight INT DEFAULT 50 NOT NULL,
  isControl TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_experimentId (experimentId)
)
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3VC7xi4RHX81jG7.65112bc774d1 --database K34VNBtbDJyjtW8qhrCBdB --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ab_variants (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  experimentId INT NOT NULL,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  description TEXT,
  interventionType VARCHAR(255),
  interventionContent TEXT,
  weight INT DEFAULT 50 NOT NULL,
  isControl TINYINT DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX idx_experimentId (experimentId)
)
